page.description: The SYS_KEYS_ENUM() function returns a list of named keys. It enumerates the valid keynames for sys_send_keys and other key functions.
page.example: ? sys_keys_enum() = BACKSPACE BREAK CAPSLOCK CLEAR DEL DOWN END ENTER ESC F1 F2 F3 F4 F5 F6 F7 F8 F9 F10 F11 F12 HELP HOME INSERT LEFT NUMLOCK PAGE DOWN PAGE UP PRINT RIGHT SCROLLLOCK TAB UP
